definitions.definition: Fully sufficient; found in copious supply; in great quantity; overflowing.
definitions.example: [W]ith their magical words they [poets] bring forth to our eyesight the abundant images and beauties of creation. — Leigh Hunt, On the Realities of Imagination

definitions.definition: Richly supplied; wealthy; possessing in great quantity.
definitions.example: Abundant in goodness and truth. — Exodus, 34:6

definitions.definition: Being an abundant number, i.e. less than the sum of all of its divisors except itself.
